item.title: Network Plus Course: Backup and Restore for Network Stability and Resilience
item.category: "IT Certification" , "Networking" , "Network Infrastructure" , "Backup and Restore" , "Disaster Recovery" , "High Availability" , "Data Protection" , "IT Resilience" , "Network Management" , "IT Operations"
item.description: Learn the importance of network device backup and restore, strategies for backing up and restoring device state and configuration, recovery sites, redundancy and high availability mechanisms, and essential metrics in network operations.

item.title: The Power of SSH: Secure Remote Access and Management Made Easy
item.category: "SSH" , "Secure Shell" , "remote access" , "remote management" , "encryption" , "authentication" , "data integrity" , "portability" , "file transfer" , "SCP" , "SSH keys" , "SSH configuration" , "network protocol" , "remote command execution" , "OpenSSH" , "two-factor authentication" , "public key cryptography" , "IP address" , "domain name" , "terminal" , "command prompt" , "security" , "system administrators" , "developers" , "versatility" , "authentication methods" , "hash functions" , "tunneling" , "custom options"
item.description: Discover the benefits of SSH, learn how to generate SSH keys, connect to remote servers, transfer files securely, and customize SSH configurations.
